title: Page from a Book of Hours  (recto and verso)
description: Double-sided; hand illuminated with color in gold leaf; text brown and red; initials red and blue; Border on one side only, blue and gold leafy scrolls, strawberries, leaves, a few small flowers; 1/2 down a man with a fiddle emerging from the mouth of a monster (whale?)
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
artist: The School of the Master of Mary of Burgundy
